member.name: P:Avanteam.Application.Pool.IApplicationProfileDescriptor.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the application profile.

member.name: P:Avanteam.Application.Pool.IApplicationProfileDescriptor.ApplicationName
member.summary: Gets the name of the application. This should be unique inside an instance.

member.name: P:Avanteam.Application.Pool.IApplicationProfileDescriptor.DbConnectionDescriptor
member.summary: Gets the connection descriptor of the APSApplication database.

member.name: P:Avanteam.Application.Pool.IApplicationProfileDescriptor.BaseUrl
member.summary: Gets the URL to use to access this web application with a browser.

member.name: P:Avanteam.Application.Pool.IWebSiteDescriptor.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the web site.

member.name: P:Avanteam.Application.Pool.IWebSiteDescriptor.DirectoryDbConnectionDescriptor
member.summary: Gets the connection string of the APSDirectory database.

member.name: P:Avanteam.Application.Pool.IWebSiteDescriptor.Applications
member.summary: Gets the collection of the applications installed in the web site.
